general.unknownUser: Unknown username. Contact your teacher in case you forgot your code.

outro.plain: SWEEEEET!! Congratulations, {{ name }}! You did amazing!!

assisstant.assessmentsAssisstant: Here are all the assessments. Go click on a flower to start an assessment. Rather want to see your profile? Click on your name to go to the profile page.
assisstant.completedTopicAssisstant: "YEAEAHEAH" well done you have completed all the questions. You can be very proud of yourself!
assisstant.profileAssisstant: This is your profile. You can see all the honeypots you have gathered. If you have enough honeypots, you can unlock new avatars. Choose the avatar you like best to be on your profile.
assisstant.questionAssisstant: You see the question on top that you need to answer. Type your answer in the white field.
assisstant.questionNumberLineAssisstant: You see a question on top. Drag the slider to the correct place on the numberline and press the green button
assisstant.questionSelectAssisstant: On top you see the question. Below are possible answers. Choose the one that you think is correct and press the green button
assisstant.questionSortPage: You need to drag the answers to the correct categories. When all the answers are in one of the categories, press the green button.
assisstant.topicAssisstant: Here is the overview of the topic. View the description carefully, before you start. Click on the green button to begin.
assisstant.topicsAssisstant: Here you can see all the topics that can be answered. If there is a red ribbon, it means you already answered the topic. For some topics you can get stars. The more stars the better! Click on a topic to start it.

auth.browserDisclaimer: Please use Chrome browser for a better experience
auth.logoutPrompt: Do you really want to logout?
auth.noInternetConnection: You need to have an internet connection in order to login
auth.inactiveStudent: Inactive student: this account is inactive, please contact a supervisor
auth.studentNotFound: Please log in with an existing account

profile.noShopOffline: You need internet connection to access the shop!

topics.finishPrevious: You have to finish the previous topic.
topics.topicCompleted: Well done! You completed the topic.

completedTopic.alreadyAnswered: You have already answered this topic, and therefore can't get more honeypots for it.

praise.praise1: You must have tried hard on this question!
praise.praise13: The more you try, the more you learn!
praise.praise14: When you work on something, you get better at it!
praise.praise4: You are doing a great job!
praise.praise7: You are very good at this!

question.exitInfo: If you exit now, you will be redirected to the Topics page.
question.skipSure: Are you sure you want to skip this question?

tutorial.answerSubmit: Press the yellow button to send your answer
tutorial.avatarShop: With honeypots you can get new characters.
tutorial.end: Great work! You have finished the practice area
tutorial.honeypotCollection: You got a honeypot, well done! You earn honey pots when you answer questions.
tutorial.introduction: Hello, nice to meet you. My name is Bee. In this game you will answer questions. I will fly with you and tell you what you have to do. Let's get started.
tutorial.numberLineQuestionAnswer: Drag the slider to number five
tutorial.numberLineQuestionTitle: On top you see the number five.
tutorial.redirection: Click here if you want to go to the beginning
tutorial.screenSizeErrorContent: Please ensure your screen is large enough to display the tutorial correctly.
tutorial.selectQuestionOptions: Below are possible answers. Choose the one that you think is correct and press the green button.
tutorial.selectQuestionTitle: On top you see the question
tutorial.startQuestion: You will get some practise questions now. Click the green button
tutorial.theFriendlyBee: If you dont know what to do on a page, click on me I will repeat the instruction
tutorial.toProfilePage: Let's fly to your profile page to find out what you can do with the honeypots.
tutorial.unlockingAvatars: You can unlock a character now

intro.enterBallon: Did you know the more flowers I get the nicer the honey taste?
intro.secondBallon: Would you help me collect pollen to make honey?
